messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are the three solutions to get out of a tie in combat?
First, use the default rule; Second, break the tie in favor of the higher skill; Third, allow both sides to inflict damage.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Is this rule applicable to ranged or firearm attacks?
No, this rule is not applicable to ranged or firearm attacks.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when both sides fail in combat?
Nothing happens.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of attack are the two sides engaging in?
A melee attack.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much damage does Harvey inflict?
1D3 damage.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage Harvey inflicts on the investigator?
1D3 damage
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the damage the deep one inflicts on the investigator?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can the Keeper do to simulate the uncertainty of an investigator's proximity to death?
Notes down the points of damage without revealing a number to the player
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can the Keeper do to keep the player guessing about the severity of an injury?
Call for a CON roll
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if the investigator falls unconscious due to a major wound?
The investigator would fall unconscious
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does the Keeper handle wounds in the game?
The Keeper can always call for a CON roll to keep the player guessing whether they have received a major wound or not.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to Harvey after being shot?
Harvey hears the shot, feels the impact in his left leg, and sees blood seeping into his trousers, before experiencing pain.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does the Keeper determine the extent of a wound?
The Keeper reveals the actual number of points of damage after the event.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the outcome of Harvey's CON roll?
Harvey's player made a successful CON roll.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the extent of Harvey's wound?
Harvey had 4 hit points of damage.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of a CON roll in the Keeper's assessment?
The Keeper confirms whether a wound is major or not.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the goal of suppressing fire in a game?
To make a group of targets 'dive for cover,' simulating panic.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who declares suppressive fire in a game?
The shooter declares they are bringing suppressive fire upon a group.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to each target in the area when suppressive fire is declared?
Each target has the option to 'dive for cover' without knowing if they will be targeted.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of people in a group when suppressed by fire?
They feel panic when fired upon.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of simulating panic when fired upon?
to simulate the panic that people might feel when fired upon
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many investigators are trying to rescue the girl?
six investigators
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many shots are fired in the direction of the investigators?
three shots
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the investigators who dive for cover?
two succeed, two fail
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does the Keeper allocate to the investigators who stand their ground?
the Keeper allocates every investigator
